item.description:
This will be our first meetup group after the summer break for July and August. Don't miss the chance to see what our members did over their summer vacations.

Parking can be difficult but not impossible to find on Newbury Street. If you are coming in from outside the city, I recommend parking a bit farther out and taking the T to Newbury.

The Hines Convention Center Stop on the Green Line brings you within one block of the Trident Cafe. In addition to the suggested donation of $2, I recommend bringing between $5 and $20 for drinks and food.

For more information, see http://www.tridentboo...

group.name: The Boston Graphic Design Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Graphic Design September Meetup
